request.description: Wallet login by SMS code. On a successful request, an SMS code will be sent to the provided phone number, which needs to be verified in a subsequent API call.

response.name: Bad Request

request.description:
This is the subsequent call to the "Request SMS Verification Code" to verify the SMS code received to the provided phone number.

Here you also need to provide the user's account address, which will be included in the JWT that is returned when verification is successful.

Most subsequent calls in the Wallet API will require the JWT you receive back from this call.

header.description: (Required) The JWT received following successful login

request.description:
Creates a wallet contract for the user.

On a successful request, the response will include an asynchronous job object which you can check its status using the [Jobs API](#4ae61445-efb3-4691-9095-75455a65db95).

header.description: (Required) The JWT received following successful login

request.description:
Delete a specific account based on both accountAddress and phoneNumber.

NOTE: If there are more than one account addresses associated with the same `phoneNumber`, they must be deleted by separate requests.

header.description: (Required) The JWT received upon successful login
